about_the_game:
NETHERVERSE




As Humanity's dimensional world collides with a parallel dimension, mysterious living organisms, called the Nethers, begin to appear on Earth. At first, the dimensional shifts between both worlds were fascinating slow transitions, where the two living species could see and learn about each other. As it became more frequent, both came to realize that one dimension would inevitably be absorbed by the other. To survive, one must eliminate any vital energy from the rival dimension.




In the Netherverse, Humans and Nethers face each other in a 6 quick rounds deathmatch. One team starts as the Hunters and must takedown the opposing team members as many times as possible. As dimension shifts between each rounds, the map layout changes, and the roles are swapped - The Hunter becomes the Hunted, and the Hunted comes the Hunter.

To win, earn the most points through 1-on-1 takedowns and objectives points each round!

KEY FEATURES


Team Battles Deathmatch
Players can team up with friends and other players to enter this 3v3 deathmatch arena. Select your character with unique abilities to support your team in the fight for your species' survival. Surprising, taunting and deceiving the hostile team is your key to victory!

Strategic Third Person Gameplay
In this character-based game, create your own meta or counter meta by adopting your own playstyle and build unique synergies with your team. Coordinate together to build offensive or defensive strategies. Experience the anxiety of being Hunted, as well as the thrill of being the Hunter!

Colliding dimensions
Have you ever experienced a world-switching battlefield? This deathmatch takes place on one world, and as the battle rages on, the landscape changes as both teams are transported to a parallel world. Navigate through different dimensions to discover their own unique twists and features!

Takedowns to win
Earn the most points through Takedowns and round objectives to win. Surprise, taunt and deceive the hostile team is your key to victory.

Show your style through customizing your character to your liking. Each character has unique takedown animations, weapon customization, outfits, VFX, and many more. Collect these items customization through in-game shopping and rewards.

content_descriptors.notes:
MILD VIOLENCE
Fights without gore or blood; display of weapons.

name: Netherverse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6300, AMD FX 4350 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 290, NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K / Core™ i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Netherverse is a Free-to-play, Third-person, Team-based, 3v3 Multiplayer Deathmatch online game set in a dystopian world. Team up, choose a class & fight to survive. Discover our unique world shifting mechanic, as well as the Human & the Nether worlds.
